lead_paragraph: "My Side of the Mountain," based on the book by Jean George, is the unique adventure of 13-year-old Sam Gribley. Sam's hero is naturalist poet Henry David Thoreau, so Sam writes a note for his folks, packs up and leaves home for the challenge of wil
